banner.text: Trade our octal trading system, get technical analysis, access historical results and much more. Everything you've been looking for is on one platform, and on the device of your choice.

what_do.card_one: Fast, secure and easy to load platform on the web.
what_do.card_two: Free practice account with an initial $1,000 USD.
what_do.title: What we do
what_do.text:
Use our platform to trade octal like the pros. Trade with us anywhere, anytime, hassle-free. No hidden commissions, no extra fees, just pay the spread if you win.

More and more people are joining octal trading, due to its ease and efficiency when creating large capitals. Simple and fast operations.

how_work.title: START INVESTING IN 4 SIMPLE STEPS.
how_work.text: Trading and earning with Betsignal is really easy, we put at your disposal our octal trading infrastructure for your benefit.
how_work.text_card_one:
Visit our website or download our app.

Don't worry about installing annoying and heavy platforms, our design is user friendly and can be used from the web, as well as installed on your mobile device.
how_work.text_card_two:
Sign up or Sign in.

Create your account with peace of mind, your personal data will always be anonymous and encrypted. No verifications that put your identity at risk. We are a 100% decentralized platform.
how_work.text_card_three: Practice or Load your funds in USDT to your betsignal wallet through the safest, cheapest and most anonymous network TRON TRC20. No reload limits or restrictions on withdrawals.
how_work.text_card_four: Trade the BTC/USDT pair and get interesting financial benefits thanks to our high payout fees, hit our single trades or invest in combo trades for bigger profits. No hidden commissions or spread for transactions.

why_we.title: Why we?
why_we.subtitle_one: We have everything you need to start
why_we.text: Octal trading and cryptocurrency markets in general are experiencing a steady increase in transactional volume, with more and more users venturing into this world. So it is a good time to become a professional Octal Trader.

payments.title: BIG BENEFITS
payments.subtitle: Trade with confidence on the world's leading octal trading platform.
payments.text: Join millions of people who have already discovered the simplest, most powerful and smartest model for investing and trading. Octal trading is changing the way traders make their fortunes.
payments.text_item_one: Our operations range from 1 minute, 3 minutes, 5 minutes, 15 minutes, maximum 30 minutes. You don't have to wait, days, weeks or even months to get returns. At betsignal fast, constant and exponential results are our priority.
payments.text_item_two:
We place a lot of emphasis on the anonymity and security that our platform represents for all of our traders. Cryptocurrencies are decentralized, so should be the platforms that operate with them.

With us you can be safe, as well as your funds. Your personal data, movements or earnings are encrypted. We do not report your movements or earnings to any entity.
payments.text_item_three: There are no trading limits at betsignal, we do not restrict you at all. You can trade as many times as you want, earn as much money as you can, and above all, withdraw as much as you want.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.text_one: In other investment platforms they did not attend me when requesting withdrawals, thanks to betsignal I have not only been able to win more than 5,250 USD, but I have also withdrawn them and without problem they have reached my binance.
testimonials.text_two: I have invested approximately 17,800 USD in betsignal, and it has really been very easy to grow my trading account. It is very different from other platforms, here it is really easy to operate, in a matter of minutes I get the result. I'm happy!
testimonials.text_three: Betsignal has been a blessing in my life and that of my family. We have found here the opportunity we were looking for. A real platform, clear, simple and above all intuitive. This is definitely something everyone should know about.
testimonials.text_four: I was giving up trying to trade on different platforms. Thank God I found you. They have helped me a lot to get ahead. I am not an expert trader, but the truth is that trading with you is very easy. I love you, thank you.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy policies
privacy_policy.text_one: BETSIGNAL respects your privacy and is committed to protecting and respecting your personal data. This privacy policy is intended to provide you with information on how we collect and process any personal data, i.e. information about a Client (as defined below) that is a natural person on the basis of which that Client can be identiﬁed ( hereinafter, the data) in accordance with the applicable legislation on data protection and best practices.
privacy_policy.text_two: We strive to create the most secure infrastructure of any broker in the world. In this privacy policy, we would like to tell you why you can trust us with your data and rest assured that your data is safe.
privacy_policy.text_three: It is important that you read this privacy policy together with any other privacy policies we may provide on specific occasions when we collect or process your data so that you are aware of how and why we use it.
privacy_policy.text_four: In this Privacy Policy, unless the context requires otherwise, expressions defined herein shall have the meanings ascribed to them in the Terms and Conditions.
privacy_policy.text_five: Please note that this Privacy Policy is directed at Clients and potential clients. If you are a BETSIGNAL employee, a BETSIGNAL contractor or a third party service provider, your personal information will be used in connection with your employment contract, your contractual relationship or in accordance with our separate policies which are available by contacting us. at the contact details listed in the OUR CONTACT DETAILS section below.

terms_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_conditions.text_one: This Agreement is entered into by and these Terms & Conditions (hereinafter referred to as the “Agreement”) shall regulate the relationship between BETSIGNAL with company No. 905 LLC 2021 and registered at: Hinds Building, Kingstown, St. Vincent and the Grenadines (hereinafter referred to as the “Company”), and the user (a natural or legal entity) (hereinafter referred to as the “Client”) of www.betsignal.com (hereinafter referred as the “Website”).
terms_conditions.text_two: 1. The Client conﬁrms that he/she has read, understood and accepted all information, conditions and terms set out on the Website which are open to be reviewed and can be examined by the public and which include important legal Information.
terms_conditions.text_three: 2. By accepting this Agreement, the Client agrees and irrevocably accepts the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement, its annexes and/or appendices as well as other documentation/information published on the Website, including without limitation to the Privacy Policy, Payment Policy, Withdrawal Policy, Code of Conduct, Order Execution Policy and Anti-Money Laundering Policy. The Client accepts this Agreement by registering an Account on the Website and depositing funds. By accepting the Agreement, and subject to the Company’s ﬁnal approval, the Client enters into a legal and binding agreement with the Company.
terms_conditions.text_four: 3. The terms of this Agreement shall be considered accepted unconditionally by the Client upon the Company's receipt of an advance payment made by the Client. As soon as the Company receives the Client's advance payment, every operation made by the Client on the Trading Platform shall be subject to the terms of this Agreement and other documentation/information on the Website.
terms_conditions.text_five: 4. The Client hereby acknowledges that each and any Operation, activity, transaction, order and/or communication performed by him/her on the Trading Platform, including without limitation through the Account, and the Website, shall be governed by and/or must be executed in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement and other documentation/information on the Website.
